Miscellaneous Highlights: The India Vs South Africa T20 match will be played on Sunday, 30 October 2022 at Optus Stadium, Australia.
The live telecast of India vs South Africa T20 will be available on Star Sports Network.
Viewers can also enjoy the live streaming on the Disney+ Hotstar app.
Team India is on the top of the ICC T20 Group 2 points table with 4 points after winning two matches - against Pakistan and the Netherlands.
Others: The following are the team squads for the upcoming India vs South Africa T20 match.
The India vs South Africa T20 match will be played at the Optus Stadium, formerly known as the Perth Stadium in western Australia.
India will play against Bangladesh on 2 November and Zimbabwe on 6 November 2022.
